adHeader: Investor Buyer Seeking Local Wholesaler w/Discounted Properties
adDetails: Hey, If you're a local real estate wholesaler and have discounted properties available in the San Jose area, we would love the opportunity to connect with you. To learn more about the specific type of investment opportunities we're interested in, reply with your contact information (name, email, website, etc.). We look forward to talking soon. Thanks. Perry Fernandez
